Title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
Writer: Gurinder Chadha (screenplay), Paul Mayeda Berges (screenplay), Will McRobb (screenplay), Chris Viscardi (screenplay), Louise Rennison (books)
Actors: Georgia Groome, Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Karen Taylor, Alan Davies
Plot: The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.
